abstract: Novartis, the Swiss drug giant, said Wednesday it has agreed to cough up $125 million for an 85 percent stake in Chinese vaccine maker Zhejiang Tianyuan Bio-Pharmaceutical.
snippet: Novartis, the Swiss drug giant, said Wednesday it has agreed to cough up $125 million for an 85 percent stake in Chinese vaccine maker Zhejiang Tianyuan Bio-Pharmaceutical.
lead_paragraph: Novartis, the Swiss drug giant, said Wednesday it had agreed to pay $125 million for an 85 percent stake in the Chinese vaccine maker Zhejiang Tianyuan Bio-Pharmaceutical.

headline.main: Novartis Pays $125 Million for Tianyuan Stake
